tickets.description: Implement the core architecture for Aurigraph V11 platform including Java/Quarkus/GraalVM foundation, reactive programming patterns, and native compilation support.
Migrate quantum cryptography services from TypeScript V10 to Java V11 implementation. Include post-quantum algorithms, quantum key distribution, and quantum-resistant encryption.
Implement the HyperRAFT++ consensus algorithm in Java with performance optimizations for 2M+ TPS target. Include leader election, log replication, and fault tolerance mechanisms.
Develop cross-chain bridge service supporting Ethereum, Polygon, BSC, Avalanche, Solana, Polkadot, Cosmos, NEAR, and Algorand. Include validator management and asset tokenization.
Implement AI/ML-based consensus optimization including predictive transaction ordering, anomaly detection, and performance tuning algorithms.
Develop Healthcare Management System (HMS) integration for real-world asset tokenization, patient data management, and healthcare blockchain applications.
Implement high-performance gRPC services with Protocol Buffers for inter-service communication, streaming APIs, and real-time data synchronization.
Optimize GraalVM native compilation with multiple profiles (fast, optimized, production) for sub-second startup and minimal memory footprint.
Develop comprehensive mobile SDKs for Flutter and React Native with wallet integration, transaction signing, and blockchain interaction capabilities.
Implement comprehensive performance testing framework with JMeter integration, load testing scenarios, and automated benchmarking for 2M+ TPS validation.
Create production-ready Kubernetes deployment configurations with Helm charts, auto-scaling (HPA/VPA), monitoring, and service mesh integration.
Implement reactive REST API endpoints using Quarkus reactive programming with Mutiny, including health checks, metrics, and OpenAPI documentation.
Develop high-performance transaction processing service with validation, execution, and state management for blockchain transactions.
Set up comprehensive monitoring with Prometheus metrics, Grafana dashboards, distributed tracing, and alerting for production environments.
Conduct comprehensive security audit and penetration testing for V11 platform including smart contract security, API security, and infrastructure security.
Create comprehensive documentation including API documentation, deployment guides, developer tutorials, and knowledge transfer materials.
Optimize CI/CD pipelines for V11 platform including automated testing, security scanning, performance benchmarking, and deployment automation.
Implement load balancing and high availability solutions for V11 platform including service discovery, circuit breakers, and failover mechanisms.

tickets.summary: Data Migration from V10 to V11
tickets.description: Plan and execute data migration from V10 TypeScript platform to V11 Java platform including state migration, configuration transfer, and data validation.
Conduct comprehensive performance benchmarking and optimization to achieve 2M+ TPS target including profiling, bottleneck identification, and optimization implementation.
